metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8760 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: ejabberd before 2.1.13 does not enforce the starttls_required setting whencompression is used, which causes clients to establish connections withoutencryption.

criterions.comment: ejabberd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
